TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StartFromZero extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates whether an axis segment should start from zero when a scale break is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The StartFromZero enumeration is used to set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisScaleBreakStyle.StartFromZero%2A> property and indicates whether an axis segment should start from zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StartFromZero Auto = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StartFromZero No = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Do not start the axis segment scale from zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StartFromZero Yes = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Start the axis segment scale from zero.
